channel.title: Private Server Website SETUP!
channel.description:
Welcome to my website setup if someone can make a demo for me I'd appreciate it
this is a html website for your private server, hope you enjoy!
This layout is a HTML version of MikeLmao Private Website Technology
his is coded in Php and SQL database
this one is merely a layout of his thats easy to setup!
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/10pzshw.png[/img]
download:
http://up.ht/Og0jAh

item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

honestly… i get it that your giving to the community… but this is TOTAL SHIT… just no… there are wayyy better templates out there but this is just shit…

well thx for releasing anyway

item.title: Private Server Website SETUP!
item.dc:creator: @EclipsedSkapez EclipsedSkapez
item.description:
@EclipsedSkapez wrote:

thanks for the comments!

[quote=“RS PS, post:2, topic:456146”]Sorry dude this is horrible, Firstly you pasted pictures to a website template you got from somewhere and added white text boxes of a grey type of color and you wrote powered wrong.

Not flaming just giving my opinion.

Thanks for the contribution though.[/quote]cheers for your comment but you could download and look at it and the coding before criticising first next time!

Read full topic
